section.name: Mission
section.p: Software is supposed to make things simple, not complicated. However, the fact is in many cases it doesn't, on purpose. Our goal is making software not profound and powerful, but simple, generic and easy to understand.
Initially, we focus on solutions for common questions like application frameworks, database tools and mathematics problems.
A list of projects here is available at Projects.

section.name: Projects
section.p: In the full project list, you may find a list of all projects in Cyclops Group. The following projects are under active development now.

section.name: In this site
section.p:
This website (www.cyclopsgroup.com) is made up of several parts.
Home: Maven generated static web site
Knowledge Base: Atlassian Confluence based knowledge base system
Issue Tracker: Atlassian JIRA based issue tracking system.
Web CVS: Cenqua Fisheye based web cvs view system.
Maven Repository: Maven Proxy based online maven repository at http://www.cyclopsgroup.com/lib.
